page.title: 10RELIGION: CHERRY WILLINGHAM
page.content: In Cherry Willingham There is a church called St. Peter and St. Paul. There is a choir which meets every Friday. They wear light blue robes with white belts. As well as this Church of England church ther is a Methodist Chapel. It has a Sunday school. In Reepham there is a C. of E. church which has the same name as the one in Cherry Willingham and the choir there have mid-blue robes and hats. Like Cherry willingham there is a Methodist Chapel, built towards the end of the last century. Attendance at the church services is generally good and at church festivals the Cherry Willingham one, it holds under 100 people, often overflows or the services are transfered to the school hall. Julie Forth{
